title: Today is Thursday July 25 however the drop-down short menu says it is Friday July 26
content: I have tried to set date and time to automatically update with 'Use network provided time zone' for both date & time and also timezone. I have also tried to manually set it. The time is correct but the date seems to change following central European time. This means at 3pm is 12 midnight and the date changes to the next days date
